divs: Sighting DetailsIt begins with a UFO sighting in my backyard where I saw searchlights shining from the local Scott Air Force Base, then a black shadow jump from tree to tree about 40 feet in the air. That was March of 2009. During the same month an apparition of a tall body with a narrow chin face appeared to me through a cloud of tobacco smoke as I smoked a cigar in my backyard. Then in Spring 2010 I began to Ghost Hunt at my house as I took dozens of detailed photographs of paranormal phenomena (apparitions, shadows, orbs, and images emblazened into woodgrain walls and carpet). During this same time through the summer of 2010, I began to take pictures of these apparitions forming within the clouds as I walked. I have dozens of pictures of supernatural apparitions within cloud formations that I only noticed after taking these pictures of normal weather phenomena, and enhancing their contrast, shadows, and lighting on photoshop. These photographs are in no way falsified or a hoax. They are 100% real, and you can tell by zooming in around the apparitions and finding zero pixelation which would indicate tampering or introduction of a new layer. I'm attaching the best 3 in this report, but I have dozens more. I am also emailing your director and editor the rest of these photos in hopes that you'll contact me and we could possibly meet in person someday to discuss this. I've already spent 3 weeks in county jail and 9.5 months in a state mental hospital after repeatedly sending these photographs in emails to the local newschannel5 KSDK (NBC) in St. Louis. I won't give up this fight for what is right until the American Public are shown these images by the American Media. I need your help. Thank you and good day, Your Fellow Countryman.
